price: I da nije ranije izrečene riječi Gospodara tvoga, kazna bi već bila neminovna.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakāna lizāman wa-ajalun musamman
